Package net.tnemc.core.region

Class RegionProvider

java.lang.Object
net.tnemc.core.region.RegionProvider
public class RegionProvider extends Object
A class that contains information related to regions such as configs, and region-sharing naming.
Since:
0.1.2.0
Author:
creatorfromhell

    • addGroup

      public void addGroup(String name, RegionGroup group)
      Used to add a region group to our existing map of groups.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the group
      group - The group instance.

    • retrieve

      public Optional<RegionGroup> retrieve(String name)
      Used to find a region group based on its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the group to find.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the RegionGroup if it exists, otherwise an empty optional.

    • multiRegion

      public boolean multiRegion()

    • resolve

      @NotNull public @NotNull String resolve(String region)
      Used to resolve the region name to its connection or itself if no connection exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to get the true name, with connection if possible.
      Returns:
      The region name if no connection, otherwise the name of the connection.
